title: Where exactly do I report people for champ select trolling
body:
I cant find where in the submit a ticket, I have only  chat evidence because i accidently lost the screenshot.
Ive got the submission ready for submitting a ticket but I dont know which category because theres none for reporting

replies.body:
Hey there,

You can just report these people in the post-game lobby as per normal, however if you feel the incident warrants further attention then feel free to submit a ticket under "I have a question about Riot Games/League of Legends" and it will be passed on to the appropriate teams.
Great however if someone dodges cause of it then there's no post-game lobby :)
I'm pretty positive that riot save chatlogs in champion select..?
